                  abs PROC
;;;26     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;27     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e3500000          CMP      r0,#0
;;;28     {
;;;29     if(in<0)in=-in;

000008  b1a00800          LSLLT    r0,r0,#16
00000c  b1a00840          ASRLT    r0,r0,#16
;;;30     return in;
;;;31     }
000010  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;32

                  clr_scrn PROC

                  find PROC

                  bin2bcd_int PROC

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;66     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000090  e92d4030          PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;67     {
;;;68     char i;
;;;69     zero_on=1;

000098  e3a01001          MOV      r1,#1

;;;71     	{
;;;72     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
0000a0  e59fcefc          LDR      r12,|L1.4004|
0000a4  e3a01005          MOV      r1,#5                 ;70
;;;73     		{
;;;74     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
0000a8  e3a03020          MOV      r3,#0x20
0000ac  e3a04000          MOV      r4,#0                 ;69
0000b0  ea000002          B        |L1.192|
                  |L1.180|
0000b4  e5de2000          LDRB     r2,[lr,#0]            ;72  ; zero_on
0000b8  e3520000          CMP      r2,#0                 ;72
0000bc  0a000006          BEQ      |L1.220|
                  |L1.192|
0000c0  e08c2001          ADD      r2,r12,r1             ;72
0000c4  e5525001          LDRB     r5,[r2,#-1]           ;72
0000c8  e3550000          CMP      r5,#0                 ;72
0000cc  1a000002          BNE      |L1.220|
0000d0  e1510000          CMP      r1,r0                 ;72
0000d4  85423001          STRBHI   r3,[r2,#-1]
0000d8  8a000004          BHI      |L1.240|
                  |L1.220|
;;;75     		}
;;;76     	else
;;;77     		{
;;;78     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;

0000e0  e5525001          LDRB     r5,[r2,#-1]

0000e8  e5425001          STRB     r5,[r2,#-1]
;;;79     		zero_on=0;
0000ec  e5ce4000          STRB     r4,[lr,#0]  ; zero_on

;;;82     }

;;;83

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;166    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;167    void int2lcd_mmm(signed short in,char xy,char des)

;;;168    {
;;;169    signed char i;
;;;170    char n;
;;;171    char s[10];

;;;177    	{

;;;185    	in/=10;

;;;194    	     {

;;;198    	     {
;;;199    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

;;;200    	     zero_on=0;
;;;201    	     simb_num++;

;;;202    	     }
;;;203    	 }
;;;204    	          
;;;205    if(minus=='-')

;;;206         {
;;;207         s[simb_num++]=minus;

;;;213              s[i]=s[i-1];

;;;218    	
;;;219    n=find(xy);

000208  ebfffffe          BL       find
;;;220    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
;;;221    	{
;;;222         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];

;;;224    }

;;;287    void long2lcdyx_mmm(signed long in,char y,char x,char des)

;;;288    {
;;;289    signed char i;

;;;291    char s[10];

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;349    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;350    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
00036c  e92d4070          PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;351    {
000370  e1a05001          MOV      r5,r1
000374  e1a06002          MOV      r6,r2
000378  e1a04003          MOV      r4,r3
;;;352    char i;
;;;353    char n;
;;;354    bin2bcd_int(in);
00037c  ebfffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;355    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
000380  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1
000384  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
000388  ebfffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
00038c  e0850105          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
;;;356    i=(y*20)+x;
000390  e0860100          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
;;;357    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
;;;358    	{ 
;;;359    	if(n<des)
;;;360    		{
;;;361    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000394  e59fcc08          LDR      r12,|L1.4004|
000398  e59f3c00          LDR      r3,|L1.4000|
00039c  e20010ff          AND      r1,r0,#0xff           ;356
0003a0  e3a00000          MOV      r0,#0                 ;357
                  |L1.932|
0003a4  e1500004          CMP      r0,r4                 ;359
0003a8  37dc2000          LDRBCC   r2,[r12,r0]
0003ac  37c32001          STRBCC   r2,[r3,r1]
;;;362    		}   
;;;363    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
0003b0  3a000006          BCC      |L1.976|
0003b4  e7dc2000          LDRB     r2,[r12,r0]
0003b8  e3520020          CMP      r2,#0x20
0003bc  0a000003          BEQ      |L1.976|
;;;364    		{
;;;365    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
0003c0  e3540000          CMP      r4,#0
;;;366    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0003c4  1083e001          ADDNE    lr,r3,r1
0003c8  154e2001          STRBNE   r2,[lr,#-1]
0003cc  07c32001          STRBEQ   r2,[r3,r1]            ;365
                  |L1.976|
0003d0  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;357
;;;367       		}   
;;;368    	i--;	
0003d4  e2411001          SUB      r1,r1,#1
0003d8  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;357
0003dc  e3500005          CMP      r0,#5                 ;357
0003e0  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff
0003e4  3affffee          BCC      |L1.932|
;;;369    	}
;;;370    }
0003e8  e8bd4070          POP      {r4-r6,lr}
0003ec  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;371    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1009   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1010   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
0003f0  e92d4010          PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1011   {
0003f4  e1a0c000          MOV      r12,r0
0003f8  e1a00001          MOV      r0,r1
0003fc  e1a04002          MOV      r4,r2
;;;1012   char temp;
;;;1013   temp=find(xy);
000400  ebfffffe          BL       find
;;;1014   
;;;1015   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1016   if(temp!=255)
000404  e35000ff          CMP      r0,#0xff
000408  0a000008          BEQ      |L1.1072|
;;;1017   while (*adr)
;;;1018   	{
;;;1019   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
00040c  e59f2b8c          LDR      r2,|L1.4000|
                  |L1.1040|
000410  e5dc1000          LDRB     r1,[r12,#0]           ;1017
000414  e3510000          CMP      r1,#0                 ;1017
000418  10803004          ADDNE    r3,r0,r4
;;;1020   	temp++;
00041c  12800001          ADDNE    r0,r0,#1
000420  128cc001          ADDNE    r12,r12,#1            ;1019
000424  120000ff          ANDNE    r0,r0,#0xff
000428  17c21003          STRBNE   r1,[r2,r3]            ;1019
00042c  1afffff7          BNE      |L1.1040|
                  |L1.1072|
;;;1021       	}
;;;1022   }
000430  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
000434  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;1023   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;814    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;815    void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
000438  e92d4070          PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;816    {
00043c  e1a05001          MOV      r5,r1
000440  e1a04002          MOV      r4,r2
;;;817    char i;
;;;818    char n;
;;;819    
;;;820    bin2bcd_int(in);
000444  ebfffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;821    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
000448  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1
00044c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
000450  ebfffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;822    i=find(xy);
000454  e1a00005          MOV      r0,r5
000458  ebfffffe          BL       find
;;;823    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
;;;824    	{
;;;825       	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
00045c  e59f3b40          LDR      r3,|L1.4004|
;;;826       		{
;;;827       		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
000460  e59fcb38          LDR      r12,|L1.4000|
000464  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0                 ;823
                  |L1.1128|
000468  e3540000          CMP      r4,#0                 ;825
00046c  1a000004          BNE      |L1.1156|
000470  e7d32001          LDRB     r2,[r3,r1]            ;825
000474  e3520020          CMP      r2,#0x20              ;825
000478  0a000001          BEQ      |L1.1156|
                  |L1.1148|
00047c  e7cc2000          STRB     r2,[r12,r0]
000480  ea00000b          B        |L1.1204|
                  |L1.1156|
;;;828       		}
;;;829       	else 
;;;830       		{
;;;831       		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000484  e1510004          CMP      r1,r4
000488  37d32001          LDRBCC   r2,[r3,r1]
00048c  3afffffa          BCC      |L1.1148|
;;;832       		else if (n==des)
;;;833       			{
;;;834       			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
000490  03a0202e          MOVEQ    r2,#0x2e
000494  07cc2000          STRBEQ   r2,[r12,r0]
;;;835       			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
000498  07d32001          LDRBEQ   r2,[r3,r1]
00049c  0a000002          BEQ      |L1.1196|
;;;836       			} 
;;;837       		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];   		
0004a0  e7d32001          LDRB     r2,[r3,r1]
0004a4  e3520020          CMP      r2,#0x20
0004a8  0a000001          BEQ      |L1.1204|
                  |L1.1196|
0004ac  e08ce000          ADD      lr,r12,r0
0004b0  e54e2001          STRB     r2,[lr,#-1]
                  |L1.1204|
0004b4  e2811001          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;823
;;;838       		}  
;;;839    		
;;;840    	i--;	
0004b8  e2400001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
0004bc  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff           ;823
0004c0  e3510005          CMP      r1,#5                 ;823
0004c4  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
0004c8  3affffe6          BCC      |L1.1128|
;;;841    	}
;;;842    }
0004cc  e8bd4070          POP      {r4-r6,lr}
0004d0  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;843    
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1032   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1033   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
0004d4  e0900002          ADDS     r0,r0,r2
;;;1034   {
;;;1035   signed int tempSI;
;;;1036   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1037   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1038   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
0004d8  40800001          ADDMI    r0,r0,r1
0004dc  4a000001          BMI      |L1.1256|
;;;1039   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
0004e0  e1500001          CMP      r0,r1
0004e4  a0400001          SUBGE    r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.1256|
;;;1040   
;;;1041   return (char)tempSI;
0004e8  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1042   }
0004ec  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;1043   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;373    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;374    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)
0004f0  e92d4ffe          PUSH     {r1-r11,lr}
;;;375    {
0004f4  e1a04000          MOV      r4,r0
0004f8  e1a05001          MOV      r5,r1
;;;376    char iii;
;;;377    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;378    unsigned int tempii;    
;;;379    		
;;;380    tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
0004fc  e3a00c0e          MOV      r0,#0xe00
000500  ebfffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
;;;381    tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));
000504  e2642000          RSB      r2,r4,#0
000508  e3a01040          MOV      r1,#0x40
00050c  ebfffffe          BL       ptr_carry
;;;382    tempii*=32;
000510  e1a00280          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;383    tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
000514  e2804b01          ADD      r4,r0,#0x400
;;;384         
;;;385    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
000518  e28d1008          ADD      r1,sp,#8
00051c  e1a00004          MOV      r0,r4
000520  ebfffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;386    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
000524  e28d1004          ADD      r1,sp,#4
000528  e2840008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
00052c  ebfffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;387    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
000530  e1a0100d          MOV      r1,sp
000534  e284000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
000538  ebfffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;388    
;;;389    iii=find(simbol);
00053c  e1a00005          MOV      r0,r5
000540  ebfffffe          BL       find
000544  e1a04000          MOV      r4,r0
;;;390         
;;;391    if(dt[0]=='U')
000548  e5dd0008          LDRB     r0,[sp,#8]
;;;392        	{ 
;;;393        	if(dt[2]=='R')
;;;394        		{
;;;395        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
;;;396        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;397        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ë';
;;;398        		}
;;;399        	
;;;400    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;401    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;402       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;403       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;404    
;;;405        	if((dt_[0]==year__)&&(dt_[1]==month__)&&(dt_[2]==day__))
00054c  e59fba58          LDR      r11,|L1.4012|
000550  e59faa48          LDR      r10,|L1.4000|
000554  e3500055          CMP      r0,#0x55              ;391
000558  e3a06040          MOV      r6,#0x40              ;381
;;;406        		{
;;;407        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00055c  e3a07030          MOV      r7,#0x30
;;;408         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
000560  e3a08021          MOV      r8,#0x21
;;;409         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;410         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;411         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;412         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;413         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;414         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
000564  e3a09023          MOV      r9,#0x23
000568  e3a05020          MOV      r5,#0x20              ;400
00056c  1a00004d          BNE      |L1.1704|
000570  e5dd000a          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0xa]          ;393
000574  e3500052          CMP      r0,#0x52              ;393
000578  1a00000b          BNE      |L1.1452|
00057c  e3a000c2          MOV      r0,#0xc2              ;395
000580  e7ca0004          STRB     r0,[r10,r4]           ;395
000584  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1              ;395
000588  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;395
00058c  e3a010ea          MOV      r1,#0xea              ;396
000590  e7ca1000          STRB     r1,[r10,r0]           ;396
000594  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;396
000598  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;396
00059c  e3a010eb          MOV      r1,#0xeb              ;397
0005a0  e7ca1000          STRB     r1,[r10,r0]           ;397
0005a4  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;397
0005a8  e20040ff          AND      r4,r0,#0xff           ;397
                  |L1.1452|
0005ac  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1              ;400
0005b0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;400
0005b4  e7ca5004          STRB     r5,[r10,r4]           ;400
0005b8  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;401
0005bc  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;401
0005c0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;401
0005c4  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;402
0005c8  ea000218          B        |L1.3632|
                  |L1.1484|
0005cc  e59f29dc          LDR      r2,|L1.4016|
0005d0  e5dd1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;405
0005d4  e1d220d0          LDRSB    r2,[r2,#0]            ;405  ; month__
0005d8  e1510002          CMP      r1,r2                 ;405
0005dc  1a00024b          BNE      |L1.3856|
                  |L1.1504|
0005e0  e59f19cc          LDR      r1,|L1.4020|
0005e4  e5dd2006          LDRB     r2,[sp,#6]            ;405
0005e8  e1d110d0          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#0]            ;405  ; day__
0005ec  e1520001          CMP      r2,r1                 ;405
0005f0  1a000246          BNE      |L1.3856|
0005f4  e7ca7000          STRB     r7,[r10,r0]           ;407
0005f8  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;407
0005fc  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;407
000600  e7ca8000          STRB     r8,[r10,r0]           ;408
000604  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;408
000608  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;408
00060c  e3a0103a          MOV      r1,#0x3a              ;409
000610  e7ca1000          STRB     r1,[r10,r0]           ;409
000614  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;409
000618  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;409
00061c  e7ca7000          STRB     r7,[r10,r0]           ;410
000620  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;410
000624  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;410
000628  e7ca6000          STRB     r6,[r10,r0]           ;411
00062c  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;411
000630  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;411
000634  e7ca1000          STRB     r1,[r10,r0]           ;412
000638  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;412
00063c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;412
000640  e7ca7000          STRB     r7,[r10,r0]           ;413
000644  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;413
000648  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;413
00064c  e7ca9000          STRB     r9,[r10,r0]
;;;415         	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
000650  e5dd0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
000654  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0
000658  e3a01021          MOV      r1,#0x21
00065c  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;416         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
000660  e5dd0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
000664  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0
000668  e3a01040          MOV      r1,#0x40
00066c  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;417         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
000670  e5dd0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]
000674  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0
000678  e3a01023          MOV      r1,#0x23
00067c  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
                  |L1.1664|
;;;418         	}	                   
;;;419    	else      	
;;;420              {
;;;421     		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;422         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;423         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;424         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;425         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;426         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;427         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;428         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;429         	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;430         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;431         	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;432    		sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]-1],'@',0);  
;;;433      		}	   
;;;434         }   
;;;435         
;;;436    else if(dt[0]=='P')
;;;437    	{
;;;438         lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ï';
;;;439         lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ñ';
;;;440        	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;441         lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;442         lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;443         lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;444         lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;445         	
;;;446         if((dt_[0]==year__)&&(dt_[1]==month__)&&(dt_[2]==day__))
;;;447         	{
;;;448             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;449         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;450        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;451        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;452        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;453         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;454         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;455         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;456             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;457         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;458         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;459         	}	                   
;;;460        	else      	
;;;461         	{
;;;462          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;463         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;464         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;465         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;466          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;467          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;468          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;469          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;470          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;471         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;472          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;473    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]-1],'@',0);  
;;;474      		}     	
;;;475         }   
;;;476    
;;;477    else if(dt[0]=='B')
;;;478        	{
;;;479        	if(dt[2]=='C')
;;;480        		{
;;;481        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;482        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;483        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;484    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;485        			{
;;;486        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;487        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;488        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;489        			}
;;;490        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;491        			{
;;;492        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;493        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;494        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;495        			}
;;;496        		else 
;;;497        			{
;;;498        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;499        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;500        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;501        			} 
;;;502        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;503         	
;;;504        		if((dt_[0]==year__)&&(dt_[1]==month__)&&(dt_[2]==day__))
;;;505        			{
;;;506        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;507       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;508        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;509        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;510        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;511       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;512       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;513       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;514       	 	    	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;515       	 		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;516       	 		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;517        			}	                   
;;;518        		else      	
;;;519        			{
;;;520        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;521        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;522        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;523        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;524        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;525        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;526        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;527        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;528        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;529        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;530        	    		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;531    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]-1],'@',0);  
;;;532        			}
;;;533        		}
;;;534        	if(dt[2]=='Z')
;;;535        		{
;;;536        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
;;;537        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ç';
;;;538        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;539        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;540        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';  
;;;541        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;542        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;543        		
;;;544        		if((dt_[0]==year__)&&(dt_[1]==month__)&&(dt_[2]==day__))
;;;545        			{
;;;546        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;547        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;548        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;549        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;550        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;551        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;552        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;553        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;554        	    		int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;555        			int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;556        			int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;557        			}	                   
;;;558     		else      	
;;;559        			{
;;;560        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;561        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;562        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;563        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;564        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;565        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;566        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;567        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;568        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;569        			
;;;570        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;571        			if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;572    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]-1],'@',0);  
;;;573        			}  		
;;;574        		}    		
;;;575    
;;;576        	if(dt[2]=='W')
;;;577        		{
;;;578        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;579        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;580        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;581    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;582        			{
;;;583        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;584        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='ð';
;;;585        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;586        			}
;;;587        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;588        			{
;;;589        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;590        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;591        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='ð';
;;;592        			}
;;;593        		else 
;;;594        			{
;;;595        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;596        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;597        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;598        			} 
;;;599        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;600        		
;;;601        		
;;;602     /*   		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;603    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;604        			{
;;;605        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;606        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='ð';
;;;607        			}
;;;608        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;609        			{
;;;610        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;611        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;612        			}
;;;613        		else 
;;;614        			{
;;;615        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;616        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;617        			}
;;;618        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';	 
;;;619        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';   */ 		
;;;620        		if((dt_[0]==year__)&&(dt_[1]==month__)&&(dt_[2]==day__))
;;;621        			{
;;;622        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;623        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;624        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;625        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;626        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;627        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;628        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;629        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;630        	    		int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;631        			int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;632        			int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;633        			}	                   
;;;634     		else      	
;;;635        			{
;;;636        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;637        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;638        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;639        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;640        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;641        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;642        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;643        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;644        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;645        			
;;;646        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;647        			if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;648    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]-1],'@',0);  
;;;649        			}  		
;;;650        		}    		
;;;651     
;;;652     	if(dt[2]=='K')
;;;653        		{
;;;654        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;655        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;656        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;657    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;658        			{
;;;659        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;660        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;661        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='å';
;;;662        			}
;;;663        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;664        			{
;;;665        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;666        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;667        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;668        			}
;;;669        		else 
;;;670        			{
;;;671        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;672        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;673        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;674        			} 
;;;675        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;676        		
;;;677        		if((dt_[0]==year__)&&(dt_[1]==month__)&&(dt_[2]==day__))
;;;678        			{
;;;679        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;680        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;681        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;682        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;683        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;684        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;685        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;686        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;687        	    		int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;688        			int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;689        			int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;690        			}	                   
;;;691     		else      	
;;;692        			{
;;;693        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;694        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;695        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;696        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;697        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;698        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;699        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;700        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';

;;;702

;;;705    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]-1],'@',0);  
;;;706        			}  		
;;;707        		}    		
;;;708    
;;;709        		     	     	
;;;710        	}     	    
;;;711         	
;;;712    else if(dt[0]=='S')
;;;713        	{
;;;714        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;715        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ï';
;;;716        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ñ';

;;;718        		{

;;;721        		}

;;;723        		{
;;;724        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;725        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;726        		}
;;;727        	else 
;;;728        		{
;;;729        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;730        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;731        		} 
;;;732        	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;733        	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;734        	
;;;735        	if((dt_[0]==year__)&&(dt_[1]==month__)&&(dt_[2]==day__))
;;;736        		{
;;;737        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;738        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;739        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;740        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;741        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;742        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;743        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;744        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;745        	    	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;746        		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;747        		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;748        		}	                   
;;;749     	else      	
;;;750        		{
;;;751        	 	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;752        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;753        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;754        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;755        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;756        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;757        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;758        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;759        		int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;760        		int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;761        		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;762    		sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]-1],'@',0);  
;;;763    		}    	
;;;764        	}
;;;765         	
;;;766    else if(dt[0]=='B')
;;;767        	{
;;;768        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;769        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;770        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';

;;;772        		{

;;;775        		}

;;;780        		}
;;;781        	else 
;;;782        		{
;;;783        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;784        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;785        		} 
;;;786        	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;787        	}     	    
;;;788         	
;;;789    else if(dt[0]=='I')
;;;790        	{
;;;791        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='È';
;;;792        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='í';
;;;793        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='â';
;;;794    	if(dt[1]<9)
;;;795        		{
;;;796        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];

;;;798        		}
;;;799        	else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;800        		{

;;;803        		}
;;;804        	else 
;;;805        		{
;;;806        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;807        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;808        		} 
;;;809        	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;810        	}    
;;;811    }

000ec0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;724
000ec4  e2811030          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;725
000ec8  e7ca1000          STRB     r1,[r10,r0]           ;725
000ecc  ea000003          B        |L1.3808|
                  |L1.3792|
000ed0  e7ca5004          STRB     r5,[r10,r4]           ;729
                  |L1.3796|
000ed4  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1              ;719
                  |L1.3800|
000ed8  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;441
000edc  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;442
                  |L1.3808|
000ee0  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;725
000ee4  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;725
000ee8  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;732
000eec  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;732
000ef0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;732
000ef4  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;733
000ef8  e5dd1004          LDRB     r1,[sp,#4]            ;735
000efc  e1db20d0          LDRSB    r2,[r11,#0]           ;735  ; year__
000f00  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;733
000f04  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;733
000f08  e1510002          CMP      r1,r2                 ;735
000f0c  0afffdf5          BEQ      |L1.1768|
                  |L1.3856|
000f10  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;751
000f14  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;751
000f18  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;751
000f1c  e7ca7000          STRB     r7,[r10,r0]           ;752
000f20  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;752
000f24  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;752
000f28  e7ca8000          STRB     r8,[r10,r0]           ;753
000f2c  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;753
000f30  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;753
000f34  e7ca6000          STRB     r6,[r10,r0]           ;754
000f38  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;754
000f3c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;754
000f40  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;755
000f44  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;755
000f48  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;755
000f4c  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;756
000f50  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;756
000f54  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;756
000f58  e7ca7000          STRB     r7,[r10,r0]           ;757
000f5c  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;757
000f60  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;757
000f64  e7ca9000          STRB     r9,[r10,r0]           ;758
000f68  e5dd0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;759
000f6c  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0                 ;759
000f70  e3a01021          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;759
000f74  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
000f78  e5dd0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;760
000f7c  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0                 ;760
000f80  e3a01023          MOV      r1,#0x23              ;760
000f84  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
000f88  e5dd0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;761
000f8c  e2400001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;761
000f90  e350000c          CMP      r0,#0xc               ;761
000f94  23a00001          MOVCS    r0,#1                 ;761
000f98  25cd0005          STRBCS   r0,[sp,#5]            ;761
000f9c  eafffdb9          B        |L1.1672|
                  |L1.4000|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.4004|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L1.4008|
                          DCD      zero_on
                  |L1.4012|
                          DCD      year__
                  |L1.4016|
                          DCD      month__
                  |L1.4020|
                          DCD      day__
                  |L1.4024|
                          DCD      ||.constdata||
                  |L1.4028|
000fbc  e3500049          CMP      r0,#0x49              ;789
000fc0  1afffdae          BNE      |L1.1664|
000fc4  e3a000c8          MOV      r0,#0xc8              ;791
000fc8  e7ca0004          STRB     r0,[r10,r4]           ;791
000fcc  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1              ;791
000fd0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;791
000fd4  e3a010ed          MOV      r1,#0xed              ;792
000fd8  e7ca1000          STRB     r1,[r10,r0]           ;792
000fdc  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;792
000fe0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;792
000fe4  e3a010e2          MOV      r1,#0xe2              ;793
000fe8  e7ca1000          STRB     r1,[r10,r0]           ;793
000fec  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;793
000ff0  e20040ff          AND      r4,r0,#0xff           ;793
000ff4  e5dd0009          LDRB     r0,[sp,#9]            ;794
000ff8  e3500009          CMP      r0,#9                 ;794
000ffc  32800031          ADDCC    r0,r0,#0x31           ;796
001000  37ca0004          STRBCC   r0,[r10,r4]           ;796
001004  3a00000d          BCC      |L1.4160|
001008  e2401009          SUB      r1,r0,#9              ;799
00100c  e351005a          CMP      r1,#0x5a              ;799
001010  2a000009          BCS      |L1.4156|
001014  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;801
001018  e3a0100a          MOV      r1,#0xa               ;801
00101c  ebfffffe          BL       __aeabi_uidivmod
001020  e2800030          ADD      r0,r0,#0x30           ;801
001024  e7ca0004          STRB     r0,[r10,r4]           ;801
001028  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1              ;801
00102c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;801
001030  e2811030          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;802
001034  e7ca1000          STRB     r1,[r10,r0]           ;802
001038  ea000003          B        |L1.4172|
                  |L1.4156|
00103c  e7ca5004          STRB     r5,[r10,r4]           ;806
                  |L1.4160|
001040  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1              ;796
001044  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;796
001048  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;797
                  |L1.4172|
00104c  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;802
001050  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff           ;802
001054  e7ca5000          STRB     r5,[r10,r0]           ;809
001058  eafffd88          B        |L1.1664|
;;;812    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;844    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;845    void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
00105c  e92d0007          PUSH     {r0-r2}
;;;846    {
001060  e0810101          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
;;;847    char i;
;;;848    char n;
;;;849    
;;;850    i=(20*y)+x;
001064  e0820100          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
;;;851    
;;;852    n=*((char*)&in);
001068  e5dd2000          LDRB     r2,[sp,#0]
00106c  e20030ff          AND      r3,r0,#0xff           ;850
;;;853    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001070  e59f0488          LDR      r0,|L1.5376|
001074  e202100f          AND      r1,r2,#0xf
001078  e7d0c001          LDRB     r12,[r0,r1]
00107c  e51f10e4          LDR      r1,|L1.4000|
001080  e7c1c003          STRB     r12,[r1,r3]
;;;854    i--;
;;;855    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001084  e7d02222          LDRB     r2,[r0,r2,LSR #4]
001088  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1              ;854
00108c  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff           ;854
001090  e7c12003          STRB     r2,[r1,r3]
;;;856    i--;
001094  e2432001          SUB      r2,r3,#1
001098  e20230ff          AND      r3,r2,#0xff
;;;857    
;;;858    n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
00109c  e5dd2001          LDRB     r2,[sp,#1]
;;;859    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0010a0  e202c00f          AND      r12,r2,#0xf
0010a4  e7d0c00c          LDRB     r12,[r0,r12]
0010a8  e7c1c003          STRB     r12,[r1,r3]
;;;860    i--;
;;;861    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0010ac  e7d02222          LDRB     r2,[r0,r2,LSR #4]
0010b0  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1              ;860
0010b4  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff           ;860
0010b8  e7c12003          STRB     r2,[r1,r3]
;;;862    i--;
0010bc  e2432001          SUB      r2,r3,#1
0010c0  e20230ff          AND      r3,r2,#0xff
;;;863    
;;;864    n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
0010c4  e5dd2002          LDRB     r2,[sp,#2]
;;;865    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0010c8  e202c00f          AND      r12,r2,#0xf
0010cc  e7d0c00c          LDRB     r12,[r0,r12]
0010d0  e7c1c003          STRB     r12,[r1,r3]
;;;866    i--;
;;;867    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0010d4  e7d02222          LDRB     r2,[r0,r2,LSR #4]
0010d8  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1              ;866
0010dc  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff           ;866
0010e0  e7c12003          STRB     r2,[r1,r3]
;;;868    i--;
0010e4  e2432001          SUB      r2,r3,#1
0010e8  e20230ff          AND      r3,r2,#0xff
;;;869    
;;;870    n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
0010ec  e5dd2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;871    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0010f0  e202c00f          AND      r12,r2,#0xf
0010f4  e7d0c00c          LDRB     r12,[r0,r12]
0010f8  e7c1c003          STRB     r12,[r1,r3]
;;;872    i--;
;;;873    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0010fc  e7d00222          LDRB     r0,[r0,r2,LSR #4]
001100  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1              ;872
001104  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff           ;872
001108  e7c10003          STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;874    i--;
;;;875    }
00110c  e28dd00c          ADD      sp,sp,#0xc
001110  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;876    
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;890    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;891    void char2lcdhyx(char in,char y,char x)
001114  e0811101          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
;;;892    {
;;;893    char i;
;;;894    
;;;895    i=(20*y)+x;
;;;896    
;;;897    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
001118  e59f33e0          LDR      r3,|L1.5376|
00111c  e0821101          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2       ;895
001120  e200200f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
001124  e7d3c002          LDRB     r12,[r3,r2]
001128  e51f2190          LDR      r2,|L1.4000|
00112c  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff           ;895
001130  e7c2c001          STRB     r12,[r2,r1]
;;;898    i--;
;;;899    lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
001134  e7d30220          LDRB     r0,[r3,r0,LSR #4]
001138  e2411001          SUB      r1,r1,#1              ;898
00113c  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff           ;898
001140  e7c20001          STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;900    i--;
;;;901    }
001144  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;902    
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;948    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;949    void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
001148  e59f23b4          LDR      r2,|L1.5380|
;;;950    {
00114c  e52de004          PUSH     {lr}
;;;951    if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
001150  e1d210d1          LDRSB    r1,[r2,#1]  ; aa
001154  e1d220d4          LDRSB    r2,[r2,#4]  ; aa
001158  e51fe1c0          LDR      lr,|L1.4000|
00115c  e3a03001          MOV      r3,#1
001160  e1510002          CMP      r1,r2
001164  e080c100          ADD      r12,r0,r0,LSL #2
001168  07ce310c          STRBEQ   r3,[lr,r12,LSL #2]
00116c  0a00001d          BEQ      |L1.4584|
001170  e51fe1d8          LDR      lr,|L1.4000|
;;;952    else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
001174  e282c001          ADD      r12,r2,#1
001178  e0800100          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;951
00117c  e151000c          CMP      r1,r12
001180  e08e0100          ADD      r0,lr,r0,LSL #2       ;951
001184  05c03014          STRBEQ   r3,[r0,#0x14]
001188  0a000016          BEQ      |L1.4584|
;;;953    else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
00118c  e282c002          ADD      r12,r2,#2
001190  e151000c          CMP      r1,r12
001194  05c03028          STRBEQ   r3,[r0,#0x28]
001198  0a000012          BEQ      |L1.4584|
;;;954    else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
00119c  e282c003          ADD      r12,r2,#3
0011a0  e151000c          CMP      r1,r12
0011a4  05c0303c          STRBEQ   r3,[r0,#0x3c]
0011a8  0a00000e          BEQ      |L1.4584|
;;;955    else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
0011ac  e282c004          ADD      r12,r2,#4
0011b0  e151000c          CMP      r1,r12
0011b4  05c03050          STRBEQ   r3,[r0,#0x50]
0011b8  0a00000a          BEQ      |L1.4584|
;;;956    else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
0011bc  e282c005          ADD      r12,r2,#5
0011c0  e151000c          CMP      r1,r12
0011c4  05c03064          STRBEQ   r3,[r0,#0x64]
0011c8  0a000006          BEQ      |L1.4584|
;;;957    else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
0011cc  e282c006          ADD      r12,r2,#6
0011d0  e151000c          CMP      r1,r12
0011d4  05c03078          STRBEQ   r3,[r0,#0x78]
0011d8  0a000002          BEQ      |L1.4584|
;;;958    else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
0011dc  e2822007          ADD      r2,r2,#7
0011e0  e1510002          CMP      r1,r2
0011e4  05c0308c          STRBEQ   r3,[r0,#0x8c]
                  |L1.4584|
;;;959    }
0011e8  e49de004          POP      {lr}
0011ec  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;960    
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;962    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;963    void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
0011f0  e92d4010          PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;964    {
;;;965    ptr_ind--;
0011f4  e59f230c          LDR      r2,|L1.5384|
0011f8  e1a04001          MOV      r4,r1                 ;964
0011fc  e5d21000          LDRB     r1,[r2,#0]  ; ptr_ind
001200  e2411001          SUB      r1,r1,#1
;;;966    ptr_ind+=offset_ind;
001204  e0800001          ADD      r0,r0,r1
001208  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
00120c  e5c20000          STRB     r0,[r2,#0]  ; ptr_ind
;;;967    aa=b[ptr_ind];
001210  e59f12f4          LDR      r1,|L1.5388|
001214  e0800100          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001218  e0811000          ADD      r1,r1,r0
00121c  e59f02e0          LDR      r0,|L1.5380|
001220  e3a02005          MOV      r2,#5
001224  ebfffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
;;;968    
;;;969    sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
001228  e59f02d4          LDR      r0,|L1.5380|
00122c  e5d01001          LDRB     r1,[r0,#1]  ; aa
001230  e0811004          ADD      r1,r1,r4
001234  e5c01001          STRB     r1,[r0,#1]  ; aa
;;;970    }
001238  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
00123c  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;971    
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;972    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;973    void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
001240  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;974    {
001244  e1a05002          MOV      r5,r2
;;;975    b[ptr_ind++]=aa;
001248  e59f22b8          LDR      r2,|L1.5384|
00124c  e1a04001          MOV      r4,r1                 ;974
001250  e5d21000          LDRB     r1,[r2,#0]  ; ptr_ind
001254  e1a07000          MOV      r7,r0                 ;974
001258  e1a06003          MOV      r6,r3                 ;974
00125c  e0810101          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
001260  e2811001          ADD      r1,r1,#1
001264  e59f32a0          LDR      r3,|L1.5388|
001268  e5c21000          STRB     r1,[r2,#0]  ; ptr_ind
00126c  e59f1290          LDR      r1,|L1.5380|
001270  e0800003          ADD      r0,r0,r3
001274  e3a02005          MOV      r2,#5
001278  ebfffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
;;;976    ind=tind;
00127c  e59f0280          LDR      r0,|L1.5380|
001280  e5c07000          STRB     r7,[r0,#0]  ; aa
;;;977    sub_ind=tsub_ind;
001284  e5c04001          STRB     r4,[r0,#1]  ; aa
;;;978    index_set=tindex_set;
001288  e5c05004          STRB     r5,[r0,#4]  ; aa
;;;979    sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
00128c  e5c06002          STRB     r6,[r0,#2]  ; aa
;;;980    }
001290  e8bd41f0          POP      {r4-r8,lr}
001294  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;981    
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;982    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;983    void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
001298  e92d4030          PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;984    {
00129c  e1a05000          MOV      r5,r0
0012a0  e1a04001          MOV      r4,r1
0012a4  e1a0c002          MOV      r12,r2
;;;985    char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;986    clr_scrn();
0012a8  ebfffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;987    
;;;988    ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
0012ac  e51f0314          LDR      r0,|L1.4000|
;;;989    for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0012b0  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0
                  |L1.4788|
;;;990    	{
;;;991    	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
0012b4  e4d5e001          LDRB     lr,[r5],#1
0012b8  e2811001          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;989
0012bc  e2802001          ADD      r2,r0,#1
0012c0  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff           ;989
0012c4  e5c0e000          STRB     lr,[r0,#0]
0012c8  e3510014          CMP      r1,#0x14              ;989
0012cc  e1a00002          MOV      r0,r2
0012d0  3afffff7          BCC      |L1.4788|
;;;992    	}
;;;993    for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0012d4  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0
                  |L1.4824|
;;;994    	{
;;;995    	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
0012d8  e4d4e001          LDRB     lr,[r4],#1
0012dc  e2811001          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;993
0012e0  e2802001          ADD      r2,r0,#1
0012e4  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff           ;993
0012e8  e5c0e000          STRB     lr,[r0,#0]
0012ec  e3510014          CMP      r1,#0x14              ;993
0012f0  e1a00002          MOV      r0,r2
0012f4  3afffff7          BCC      |L1.4824|
;;;996    	}
;;;997    for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0012f8  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0
                  |L1.4860|
;;;998    	{
;;;999    	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
0012fc  e4dce001          LDRB     lr,[r12],#1
001300  e2811001          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;997
001304  e2802001          ADD      r2,r0,#1
001308  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff           ;997
00130c  e5c0e000          STRB     lr,[r0,#0]
001310  e3510014          CMP      r1,#0x14              ;997
001314  e1a00002          MOV      r0,r2
001318  3afffff7          BCC      |L1.4860|
;;;1000   	}
;;;1001   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00131c  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0
                  |L1.4896|
;;;1002   	{
;;;1003   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
001320  e4d3c001          LDRB     r12,[r3],#1
001324  e2811001          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;1001
001328  e2802001          ADD      r2,r0,#1
00132c  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff           ;1001
001330  e5c0c000          STRB     r12,[r0,#0]
001334  e3510014          CMP      r1,#0x14              ;1001
001338  e1a00002          MOV      r0,r2
00133c  3afffff7          BCC      |L1.4896|
;;;1004   	}
;;;1005   
;;;1006   
;;;1007   }
001340  e8bd4030          POP      {r4,r5,lr}
001344  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;1008   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1024   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1025   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
001348  e92d4010          PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1026   {
00134c  e59d4008          LDR      r4,[sp,#8]
;;;1027   bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
001350  ebfffffe          BL       bgnd_par
;;;1028   tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
001354  e59f01a8          LDR      r0,|L1.5380|
001358  e5d03003          LDRB     r3,[r0,#3]  ; aa
00135c  e5d02002          LDRB     r2,[r0,#2]  ; aa
001360  e5d01001          LDRB     r1,[r0,#1]  ; aa
001364  e3a00046          MOV      r0,#0x46
001368  ebfffffe          BL       tree_up
;;;1029   ret((char)(m_sec/100));
00136c  e3a01064          MOV      r1,#0x64
001370  e1a00004          MOV      r0,r4
001374  ebfffffe          BL       __aeabi_idivmod
001378  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
00137c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
001380  eafffffe          B        ||ret||
;;;1030   }
;;;1031   
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1044   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1045   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
001384  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1046   {
;;;1047   char iii;
;;;1048   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1049   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1050   		
;;;1051   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1052   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1053   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1054   tempii*=32;
001388  e1a00280          LSL      r0,r0,#5
00138c  e1a05001          MOV      r5,r1                 ;1046
;;;1055   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
001390  e2804b01          ADD      r4,r0,#0x400
;;;1056        
;;;1057   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
001394  e28d1008          ADD      r1,sp,#8
001398  e1a00004          MOV      r0,r4
00139c  ebfffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1058   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
0013a0  e28d1004          ADD      r1,sp,#4
0013a4  e2840008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
0013a8  ebfffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1059   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
0013ac  e1a0100d          MOV      r1,sp
0013b0  e284000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
0013b4  ebfffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1060   
;;;1061   iii=find(simbol);
0013b8  e1a00005          MOV      r0,r5
0013bc  ebfffffe          BL       find
;;;1062   
;;;1063   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0013c0  e51f4428          LDR      r4,|L1.4000|
0013c4  e3a06020          MOV      r6,#0x20
0013c8  e7c46000          STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
0013cc  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0013d0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1064   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0013d4  e3a07030          MOV      r7,#0x30
0013d8  e7c47000          STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
0013dc  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0013e0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1065   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
0013e4  e3a08021          MOV      r8,#0x21
0013e8  e7c48000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
0013ec  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0013f0  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1066   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
0013f4  e3a09040          MOV      r9,#0x40
0013f8  e7c49000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
0013fc  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001400  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1067   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001404  e7c46000          STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
001408  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
00140c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1068   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001410  e7c46000          STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
001414  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001418  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1069   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00141c  e7c47000          STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
001420  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001424  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1070   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
001428  e3a01023          MOV      r1,#0x23
00142c  e7c41000          STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
001430  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001434  e20050ff          AND      r5,r0,#0xff
;;;1071   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
001438  e5dd0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
00143c  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0
001440  e3a01021          MOV      r1,#0x21
001444  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1072   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
001448  e5dd0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
00144c  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0
001450  e3a01023          MOV      r1,#0x23
001454  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1073   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
001458  e5dd0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
;;;1074   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]-1],'@',0); 
00145c  e51f14ac          LDR      r1,|L1.4024|
001460  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0
001464  e2400001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;1073
001468  e350000c          CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1073
00146c  23a00001          MOVCS    r0,#1                 ;1073
001470  25cd0005          STRBCS   r0,[sp,#5]            ;1073
001474  e5dd0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
001478  e0810100          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
00147c  e2400004          SUB      r0,r0,#4
001480  e3a01040          MOV      r1,#0x40
001484  ebfffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1075   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
001488  e2850001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
00148c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
001490  e7c46005          STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1076   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001494  e7c47000          STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
001498  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
00149c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1077   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
0014a0  e7c48000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
0014a4  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0014a8  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1078   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
0014ac  e3a0103a          MOV      r1,#0x3a
0014b0  e7c41000          STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
0014b4  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0014b8  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1079   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0014bc  e7c47000          STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
0014c0  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0014c4  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
;;;1080   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
0014c8  e7c49000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
0014cc  e2800001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0014d0  e20050ff          AND      r5,r0,#0xff
;;;1081   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
0014d4  e5dd0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
0014d8  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0
0014dc  e3a01021          MOV      r1,#0x21
0014e0  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1082   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
0014e4  e5dd0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
0014e8  e3a02000          MOV      r2,#0
0014ec  e3a01040          MOV      r1,#0x40
0014f0  ebfffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1083      		     		
;;;1084   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0014f4  e7c46005          STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1085   }	
0014f8  e8bd43fe          POP      {r1-r9,lr}
0014fc  e12fff1e          BX       lr
                          ENDP

                  |L1.5376|

                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;26     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;27     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e92d4070          PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;28     {
;;;29     if(in<0)in=-in;
000004  e3500000          CMP      r0,#0
000008  b1e00000          MVNLT    r0,r0
00000c  b2800001          ADDLT    r0,r0,#1
;;;30     return in;
;;;31     }
000010  b1a00800          LSLLT    r0,r0,#16
000014  e1a05001          MOV      r5,r1
000018  e1a04002          MOV      r4,r2
00001c  b1a00840          ASRLT    r0,r0,#16
000020  ebfffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000024  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1
000028  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
00002c  ebfffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000030  e1a00005          MOV      r0,r5
000034  ebfffffe          BL       find
000038  e35000ff          CMP      r0,#0xff
00003c  0a000018          BEQ      |L2.164|
000040  e59fc064          LDR      r12,|L2.172|
000044  e59f3064          LDR      r3,|L2.176|
000048  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0
                  |L2.76|
00004c  e1510004          CMP      r1,r4
000050  37dc2001          LDRBCC   r2,[r12,r1]
000054  3a000008          BCC      |L2.124|
000058  03a0202e          MOVEQ    r2,#0x2e
00005c  07c32000          STRBEQ   r2,[r3,r0]
000060  07dc2001          LDRBEQ   r2,[r12,r1]
000064  0a000006          BEQ      |L2.132|
000068  e7dc2001          LDRB     r2,[r12,r1]
00006c  e3520020          CMP      r2,#0x20
000070  0a000005          BEQ      |L2.140|
000074  e3540000          CMP      r4,#0
000078  1a000001          BNE      |L2.132|
                  |L2.124|
00007c  e7c32000          STRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000080  ea000001          B        |L2.140|
                  |L2.132|
000084  e083e000          ADD      lr,r3,r0
000088  e54e2001          STRB     r2,[lr,#-1]
                  |L2.140|
00008c  e2811001          ADD      r1,r1,#1
000090  e2400001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000094  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff
000098  e3510005          CMP      r1,#5
00009c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
0000a0  3affffe9          BCC      |L2.76|
                  |L2.164|
0000a4  e8bd4070          POP      {r4-r6,lr}
0000a8  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;32     
                          ENDP

                  |L2.172|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.176|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;26     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;27     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e92d4070          PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;28     {
;;;29     if(in<0)in=-in;
000004  e3500000          CMP      r0,#0
000008  b2600000          RSBLT    r0,r0,#0
00000c  b1a00800          LSLLT    r0,r0,#16
;;;30     return in;
;;;31     }
000010  e1a06001          MOV      r6,r1
000014  e1a04002          MOV      r4,r2
000018  b1a00840          ASRLT    r0,r0,#16
00001c  e3a0502d          MOV      r5,#0x2d
000020  ebfffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000024  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1
000028  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
00002c  ebfffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000030  e1a00006          MOV      r0,r6
000034  ebfffffe          BL       find
000038  e59fc08c          LDR      r12,|L3.204|
00003c  e59f308c          LDR      r3,|L3.208|
000040  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0
                  |L3.68|
000044  e3540000          CMP      r4,#0
000048  1a00000b          BNE      |L3.124|
00004c  e7dc2001          LDRB     r2,[r12,r1]
000050  e3520020          CMP      r2,#0x20
000054  0a000008          BEQ      |L3.124|
000058  e08ce001          ADD      lr,r12,r1
00005c  e5dee001          LDRB     lr,[lr,#1]
000060  e35e0020          CMP      lr,#0x20
000064  0355002d          CMPEQ    r5,#0x2d
000068  03a0e02d          MOVEQ    lr,#0x2d
00006c  00836000          ADDEQ    r6,r3,r0
000070  0546e001          STRBEQ   lr,[r6,#-1]
                  |L3.116|
000074  e7c32000          STRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000078  ea00000b          B        |L3.172|
                  |L3.124|
00007c  e1510004          CMP      r1,r4
000080  37dc2001          LDRBCC   r2,[r12,r1]
000084  3afffffa          BCC      |L3.116|
000088  03a0202e          MOVEQ    r2,#0x2e
00008c  07c32000          STRBEQ   r2,[r3,r0]
000090  07dc2001          LDRBEQ   r2,[r12,r1]
000094  0a000002          BEQ      |L3.164|
000098  e7dc2001          LDRB     r2,[r12,r1]
00009c  e3520020          CMP      r2,#0x20
0000a0  0a000001          BEQ      |L3.172|
                  |L3.164|
0000a4  e083e000          ADD      lr,r3,r0
0000a8  e54e2001          STRB     r2,[lr,#-1]
                  |L3.172|
0000ac  e2811001          ADD      r1,r1,#1
0000b0  e2400001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
0000b4  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff
0000b8  e3510005          CMP      r1,#5
0000bc  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
0000c0  3affffdf          BCC      |L3.68|
0000c4  e8bd4070          POP      {r4-r6,lr}
0000c8  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;32     
                          ENDP

                  long2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;26     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;27     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;28     {
;;;29     if(in<0)in=-in;
000004  e3500000          CMP      r0,#0
000008  e3a0802b          MOV      r8,#0x2b
00000c  e1a07001          MOV      r7,r1
;;;30     return in;
;;;31     }
000010  e1a05002          MOV      r5,r2
000014  b2600000          RSBLT    r0,r0,#0
000018  b3a0802d          MOVLT    r8,#0x2d
00001c  e3a04000          MOV      r4,#0
000020  e1a0600d          MOV      r6,sp
                  |L4.36|
000024  e3a0100a          MOV      r1,#0xa
000028  ebfffffe          BL       __aeabi_idivmod
00002c  e7c61004          STRB     r1,[r6,r4]
000030  e2841001          ADD      r1,r4,#1
000034  e1a04c01          LSL      r4,r1,#24
000038  e1a04c44          ASR      r4,r4,#24
00003c  e354000a          CMP      r4,#0xa
000040  bafffff7          BLT      |L4.36|
000044  e3a01001          MOV      r1,#1
000048  e3a04000          MOV      r4,#0
00004c  e3a00009          MOV      r0,#9
000050  e3a02020          MOV      r2,#0x20
000054  ea000001          B        |L4.96|
                  |L4.88|
000058  e3510000          CMP      r1,#0
00005c  0a000005          BEQ      |L4.120|
                  |L4.96|
000060  e7d63000          LDRB     r3,[r6,r0]
000064  e3530000          CMP      r3,#0
000068  1a000002          BNE      |L4.120|
00006c  e1500005          CMP      r0,r5
000070  c7c62000          STRBGT   r2,[r6,r0]
000074  ca000005          BGT      |L4.144|
                  |L4.120|
000078  e7d61000          LDRB     r1,[r6,r0]
00007c  e2843001          ADD      r3,r4,#1
000080  e20340ff          AND      r4,r3,#0xff
000084  e2811030          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30
000088  e7c61000          STRB     r1,[r6,r0]
00008c  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0
                  |L4.144|
000090  e2400001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000094  e1a00c00          LSL      r0,r0,#24
000098  e1b00c40          ASRS     r0,r0,#24
00009c  5affffed          BPL      |L4.88|
0000a0  e358002d          CMP      r8,#0x2d
0000a4  02840001          ADDEQ    r0,r4,#1
0000a8  07c68004          STRBEQ   r8,[r6,r4]
0000ac  020040ff          ANDEQ    r4,r0,#0xff
0000b0  e3550000          CMP      r5,#0
0000b4  0a00000d          BEQ      |L4.240|
0000b8  e1a00c04          LSL      r0,r4,#24
0000bc  ea000004          B        |L4.212|
                  |L4.192|
0000c0  e0861000          ADD      r1,r6,r0
0000c4  e5511001          LDRB     r1,[r1,#-1]
0000c8  e2402001          SUB      r2,r0,#1
0000cc  e7c61000          STRB     r1,[r6,r0]
0000d0  e1a00c02          LSL      r0,r2,#24
                  |L4.212|
0000d4  e1a00c40          ASR      r0,r0,#24
0000d8  e1500005          CMP      r0,r5
0000dc  cafffff7          BGT      |L4.192|
0000e0  e3a0002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
0000e4  e7c60005          STRB     r0,[r6,r5]
0000e8  e2840001          ADD      r0,r4,#1
0000ec  e20040ff          AND      r4,r0,#0xff
                  |L4.240|
0000f0  e1a00007          MOV      r0,r7
0000f4  ebfffffe          BL       find
0000f8  e59f2028          LDR      r2,|L4.296|
0000fc  e3a01000          MOV      r1,#0
                  |L4.256|
000100  e1510004          CMP      r1,r4
000104  b7d63001          LDRBLT   r3,[r6,r1]
000108  b040c001          SUBLT    r12,r0,r1
00010c  b2811001          ADDLT    r1,r1,#1
000110  b1a01c01          LSLLT    r1,r1,#24
000114  b1a01c41          ASRLT    r1,r1,#24
000118  b7c2300c          STRBLT   r3,[r2,r12]
00011c  bafffff7          BLT      |L4.256|
000120  e8bd43fe          POP      {r1-r9,lr}
000124  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;32     
                          ENDP

                  |L4.296|

                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;26     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;27     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e92d4010          PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;28     {
;;;29     if(in<0)in=-in;
000004  e1a04000          MOV      r4,r0
000008  e1a00001          MOV      r0,r1
00000c  ebfffffe          BL       find
;;;30     return in;
;;;31     }
000010  e59f2024          LDR      r2,|L5.60|
000014  e204100f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000018  e7d23001          LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
00001c  e59f101c          LDR      r1,|L5.64|
000020  e7c13000          STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000024  e7d22224          LDRB     r2,[r2,r4,LSR #4]
000028  e2400001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00002c  e20000ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff
000030  e7c12000          STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000034  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
000038  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;32     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.60|

                  |L5.64|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.6||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.6||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;26     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;27     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e0811101          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
;;;28     {
;;;29     if(in<0)in=-in;
000004  e0821101          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
000008  e59f2054          LDR      r2,|L6.100|
00000c  e200300f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
;;;30     return in;
;;;31     }
000010  e7d2c003          LDRB     r12,[r2,r3]
000014  e59f304c          LDR      r3,|L6.104|
000018  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff
00001c  e7c3c001          STRB     r12,[r3,r1]
000020  e1a00220          LSR      r0,r0,#4
000024  e200c00f          AND      r12,r0,#0xf
000028  e7d2c00c          LDRB     r12,[r2,r12]
00002c  e2411001          SUB      r1,r1,#1
000030  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff
000034  e1a00220          LSR      r0,r0,#4
000038  e7c3c001          STRB     r12,[r3,r1]
00003c  e200c00f          AND      r12,r0,#0xf
000040  e7d2c00c          LDRB     r12,[r2,r12]
000044  e2411001          SUB      r1,r1,#1
000048  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff
00004c  e7c3c001          STRB     r12,[r3,r1]
000050  e7d20220          LDRB     r0,[r2,r0,LSR #4]
000054  e2411001          SUB      r1,r1,#1
000058  e20110ff          AND      r1,r1,#0xff
00005c  e7c30001          STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
000060  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;32     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.100|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L6.104|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;26     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;27     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  e0811101          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
;;;28     {
;;;29     if(in<0)in=-in;
000004  e0821101          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
000008  e20130ff          AND      r3,r1,#0xff
00000c  e59f10b0          LDR      r1,|L7.196|
;;;30     return in;
;;;31     }
000010  e2002001          AND      r2,r0,#1
000014  e7d1c002          LDRB     r12,[r1,r2]
000018  e59f20a8          LDR      r2,|L7.200|
00001c  e1a000a0          LSR      r0,r0,#1
000020  e7c2c003          STRB     r12,[r2,r3]
000024  e200c001          AND      r12,r0,#1
000028  e7d1c00c          LDRB     r12,[r1,r12]
00002c  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1
000030  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff
000034  e7c2c003          STRB     r12,[r2,r3]
000038  e1a000a0          LSR      r0,r0,#1
00003c  e200c001          AND      r12,r0,#1
000040  e7d1c00c          LDRB     r12,[r1,r12]
000044  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1
000048  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff
00004c  e7c2c003          STRB     r12,[r2,r3]
000050  e1a000a0          LSR      r0,r0,#1
000054  e200c001          AND      r12,r0,#1
000058  e7d1c00c          LDRB     r12,[r1,r12]
00005c  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1
000060  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff
000064  e7c2c003          STRB     r12,[r2,r3]
000068  e1a000a0          LSR      r0,r0,#1
00006c  e200c001          AND      r12,r0,#1
000070  e7d1c00c          LDRB     r12,[r1,r12]
000074  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1
000078  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff
00007c  e7c2c003          STRB     r12,[r2,r3]
000080  e1a000a0          LSR      r0,r0,#1
000084  e200c001          AND      r12,r0,#1
000088  e7d1c00c          LDRB     r12,[r1,r12]
00008c  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1
000090  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff
000094  e1a000a0          LSR      r0,r0,#1
000098  e7c2c003          STRB     r12,[r2,r3]
00009c  e200c001          AND      r12,r0,#1
0000a0  e7d1c00c          LDRB     r12,[r1,r12]
0000a4  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1
0000a8  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff
0000ac  e7c2c003          STRB     r12,[r2,r3]
0000b0  e7d100a0          LDRB     r0,[r1,r0,LSR #1]
0000b4  e2433001          SUB      r3,r3,#1
0000b8  e20330ff          AND      r3,r3,#0xff
0000bc  e7c20003          STRB     r0,[r2,r3]
0000c0  e12fff1e          BX       lr
;;;32     
                          ENDP

                  |L7.196|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L7.200|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||.constdata||, DATA, READONLY, ALIGN=0

                  sm_mont
000000  ffede200          DCB      0xff,0xed,0xe2,0x00
000004  f4e5e200          DCB      0xf4,0xe5,0xe2,0x00
000008  ece0f000          DCB      0xec,0xe0,0xf0,0x00
00000c  e0eff000          DCB      0xe0,0xef,0xf0,0x00
000010  ece0e900          DCB      0xec,0xe0,0xe9,0x00
000014  e8feed00          DCB      0xe8,0xfe,0xed,0x00
000018  e8feeb00          DCB      0xe8,0xfe,0xeb,0x00
00001c  e0e2e300          DCB      0xe0,0xe2,0xe3,0x00
000020  f1e5ed00          DCB      0xf1,0xe5,0xed,0x00
000024  eeeaf200          DCB      0xee,0xea,0xf2,0x00
000028  edeeff00          DCB      0xed,0xee,0xff,0x00
00002c  e4e5ea00          DCB      0xe4,0xe5,0xea,0x00
